projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Built a portfolio page using React and Tailwind in the front end, created a Node server to host images, descriptions and other information, this should increase performance and also allow for easier updates when I create more projects, or just wish to change various images and icons on the page. I decided to use Tailwind since it was relatively new to me and it looked enjoyable- it was!
